instruction: Rewrite this article from a different perspective
input: Modern technology has revolutionized our lives. Everyday tasks are now easier and more efficient with the use of phones, computers and other digital devices.
output: Although technologically advanced digital devices have come to dominate modern life, we should be aware of the potential pitfalls of relying too heavily on them. It is important to be mindful of our surroundings and not get too caught up in the convenience that technology offers. We should remember to take time to enjoy the more traditional activities of life, as these can often provide essential lessons that technology cannot.
